reuters.title: MANGOOD CORP <MAB> YEAR OPER LOSS
reuters.body: Oper shr loss 6.07 vs loss 7.64 dlrs Oper net loss 6,235,000 vs loss 4,801,000 Sales 70.1 mln vs 60.6 mln Avg shrs 1,028,000 vs 629,000 NOTE: 1986 earnings exclude a gain on restructuring of 3,143,000 dlrs, or 3.01 dlrs a share Reuter 
